skill.name: Poison Resistance
skill.desc: This hunter can't suffer the :poison: status ailment.

skill.name: Slugger
skill.desc: Once per quest, when this hunter uses a :stun: status ailment attack card, place +1 :stun: token.

skill.name: Guard
skill.desc: When this hunter plays an attack card that grants additional armour, the card gains +1 :armor:.

skill.name: Stun Resistance
skill.desc: This hunter can't suffer the :stun: status ailment.

skill.name: Speed Eating
skill.desc: Once per quest, this hunter may use combat actions and preparation actions during the same turn.
skill.alt: Once per quest, if you play a potion or ration item card, resolve its effect at the end of this turn instead of at the start of your next turn.

skill.name: Palico Rally
skill.desc: This hunter may use their Palico ability twice per quest.

skill.name: Weakness Exploit
skill.desc: When you play an attack card with :combo: of 2 or more, draw +1 :damage:.

skill.name: Critical Eye
skill.desc: When you draw :damage:, draw +1 :damage:, then choose 1 :damage: to place on top of your damage deck before inflicting damage to the monster.

skill.name: Sporepuff Expert
skill.desc: When this hunter recovers health from anything that isn't a potion, recover 1 additional health.

skill.name: Botanist
skill.desc: During the gathering phase, when the hunters gain a potion they may all immediately recover to full health without spending a potion.

skill.name: Poison Resistance
skill.desc: This hunter can't suffer the :poison: status ailment.

skill.name: Constitution
skill.desc: Once per quest when this hunter successfully dodges a monster attack, discard your attack cards instead of placing them on your stamina board.

skill.name: Evade Extender
skill.desc: When this hunter successfully dodges a monster attack, they may move 1 additional node.

skill.name: Thunder Attack
skill.desc: When this hunter plays a :thunder: elemental attack card, draw +1 :damage:.

skill.name: Fire Attack
skill.desc: When this hunter plays a :fire: elemental attack, draw +1 :damage:.

skill.name: Marathon Runner
skill.desc: When this hunter walks, they move up to 2 nodes instead of 1.

skill.name: Aquatic Expert
skill.desc: When this hunter moves onto pond nodes they don't discard damage cards.

skill.name: Water Attack
skill.desc: When this hunter plays a :water: elemental attack card, draw +1 :damage:.

skill.name: Intimidator
skill.desc: This hunter can't suffer damage during the gathering phase.

skill.name: Azure Rathalos Mastery
skill.desc: When this hunter would draw an elemental damage card, draw 3 cards before choosing 1 to resolve.

skill.name: Focus
skill.desc: When this hunter uses an attack card with :combo:, reduce the :combo: value by 1 to a minimum of 1.

skill.name: Black Diablos Mastery
skill.desc: When this hunter plays an attack card without an elemental damage symbol, draw +1 :damage:.

skill.name: Resentment
skill.desc: If this hunter recovered health during your previous turn, the first attack card you play this turn gains +2 :damage:.

skill.name: Part Breaker
skill.desc: When this hunter plays an attack card with 1 or more :break:, the card gains +1 :break:.

skill.name: Heroics
skill.desc: While this hunter has 2 health or less, when this hunter plays an attack card without an elemental damage symbol, draw +1 :damage:.

skill.name: Slugger
skill.desc: Once per quest, when this hunter uses a :stun: status ailment attack card, place +1 :stun: token.

skill.name: Diablos Mastery
skill.desc: When this hunter plays an attack card without an elemental damage symbol, draw +1 :damage:.

skill.name: Rathalos Mastery
skill.desc: When this hunter plays a :fire: elemental attack card, instead of placing an elemental token draw 1 elemental damage card. This doesn't effect monster with immunity :fire:.

skill.name: Rathalos Power
skill.desc: Once per quest, this player may swap their hunter token with another player. The facing of the hunter token each player now has should match the facing of their previous token.

skill.name: Sleep Resistance
skill.desc: This hunter can't suffer the :sleep: status ailment.

skill.name: Ice Attack
skill.desc: When this hunter plays a :ice: elemental attack card, draw +1 :damage:.

skill.name: Kushala Daora Flight
skill.desc: When this hunter plays 1 or more attack cards to dodge monster attacks or sprint, add +1 :agility: to their agility total.

skill.name: Handicraft
skill.desc: Once per quest, if your damage deck becomes empty while resolving an attack card, you may immediately sharpen and continue to resolve the attack.

skill.name: Maximum Might
skill.desc: When you draw :damage:, draw +2 :damage:, then choose 2 :damage: to place back on top of your damage deck before inflicting damage to the monster.

skill.name: Agitator
skill.desc: When you select a broken body part to attack, your attack cards which inflict damage gain +1 :damage:.

skill.name: Nergigante Hunter
skill.desc: If your hunter inflicts 1 or more damage to the monster during your turn, recover 1 health.

skill.name: Latent Power
skill.desc: If this hunter suffered damage during the monster's last turn, draw +1 :damage: for the first attack card you play this turn which inflicts damage.

skill.name: Teostra Technique
skill.desc: Once per quest when this hunter plays an attack card, shuffle any :damage: you draw into your damage deck instead of discarding them.

skill.name: Weakness Exploit
skill.desc: When this hunter plays an attack card with :combo: of 2 or more, draw +1 :damage:.

skill.name: Stun Resistance
skill.desc: This hunter can't suffer the :stun: staus ailment.

skill.name: Water Attack
skill.desc: When this hunter plays a :water: elemental attack card, draw +1 :damage:.

skill.name: Sleep Resistance
skill.desc: This hunter can't suffer the :sleep: status ailment.

skill.name: Horn Maestro
skill.desc: When this hunter plays a song, that song gains +1 :range:.

skill.name: Lesser Paralysis Resistance
skill.desc: When this hunter suffers the :para: status ailment, discard down to 3 cards in your hand instead of 2.

skill.name: Paralysis Attack
skill.desc: Once per quest, when this hunter uses a :para: status ailment attack card, place +1 :para: token.

skill.name: Slugger
skill.desc: Once per quest, when this hunter uses a :stun: status ailment attack card, place +1 :stun: token.

skill.name: Sleep Attack
skill.desc: Once per quest, when this hunter uses a :sleep: status ailment attack card, place +1 :sleep: token.

skill.name: Guard
skill.desc: When this hunter plays an attack card which grant additional armour, the card gains +1 :armor:.

skill.name: Marathon Runner
skill.desc: When this hunter walks, they move up to 2 nodes instead of 1.

skill.name: Thunder Attack
skill.desc: When this hunter plays a :thunder: attack card, draw +1 :damage:.

skill.name: Kirin Favour
skill.desc: Once per quest, after the group have rolled on the monster's reward table, you may roll for rewards a second time.
